resources.string: Only playlists that you own are displayed. Editing collaborative playlists owned by other users is currently unsupported.
Norman couldn\'t find your playlists. He recommends trying to log in again.
Meow. Seems like norman lost the tracks for this song. So here is a joke instead: \nQ: Do you want to hear a bad cat joke? \nA: Just kitten.
While Norman was on his way to the spotify servers he lost your changes. He is very sorry but he is also fairly sure you can just try again.
Seems like Norman chewed on some important info. You might have to try that again.
Norman won\'t play unless you tell him your name! Please try logging in again.
They didn\'t let Norman into the spotify building! Try logging in again.
